title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: bundled Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs as a single self-contained CLI with a built-in model registry and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; install via npm.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that exposes Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model; runs locally with Docker or npm.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps ollama with readline history & syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats using any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama and common models for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for running Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI pipelines and dev environments.
